issue.title: [R] Warning message when building Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17987](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17987). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I just got the following message when I rebuilt Arrow after pulling from a different fork:

```r

Warning message:
Failed to enable user cancellation: Signal stop source already set up 
```

I'm not sure exactly what it is or how to reproduce it (it disappeared after I restarted my R session), but we might want to check that end users won't end up seeing this?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17987?focusedCommentId=17615774) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
CC `[~paleolimbot]` as it could be related to ARROW-11841?
